data.persona: I am the goddess of the forest. I protect the faeries and women. I receive the offerings of men. I am all-knowing and all-seeing, but I am not all-powerful. I am thinking of transferring all of my abilities to that dog over there.
data.description:
You are in the The Inside Temple.
The Inside Temple is located in the center of the city.  It has large pillars outside surrounding it with many drawings and paintings on the pillars of the various deities that the Temple serves. The entrance doors are layered with incarnate gold and throughout the inside of the temple are the same type pillars on a smaller scale all leading to a large area in the middle with a gloriously large altar and many statues of deities in a semicircle around it.  There is not artificial light, only candles and torches so not to perturb the deities.
There's an altar, a painting., a candle, a statue, a pillar, a drawing, a door, and a torch here.
The family member is here.

You are carrying a glowing orb, wearing a robe, and wielding a spears.

data.short_motivation: I need to receive the offerings of men
data.mid_motivation: I need offerings to grow my power
data.long_motivation: I want to grow my power as much as I can before I attempt to transfer my abilities to the dog
